entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
